collection:
This Privacy
Notice outlines how we handle your data, even though we do not collect or
store any personal data.
**Data Collection:** We do not collect or store any data from our users.
**Data Usage Purpose:** Your data is not collected or used for any purpose other than interacting with our GPT bot.
**Data Retention:** Since we do not collect data, there is no data retention period.
**Your Rights:** As we do not collect data, there are no user rights related to data.
